weaponList.name: Neon Dagger
weaponList.description: A dagger that channels the power of the Neon Grid, allowing the wielder to move at the speed of light and strike with deadly precision.

weaponList.name: Aetherblade
weaponList.description: A sword forged with pure Aether energy, capable of slicing through both matter and code.

weaponList.name: Night Club
weaponList.description: A basic club that can be used to bash enemies.

weaponList.name: Neon Dagger
weaponList.description: A dagger that channels the power of the Neon Grid, allowing the wielder to move at the speed of light and strike with deadly precision.

weaponList.name: Neon Dagger
weaponList.description: A dagger that channels the power of the Neon Grid, allowing the wielder to move at the speed of light and strike with deadly precision.

armorList.name: Aether Reactor Suit
armorList.description: A suit that harnesses Aether energy to power a protective barrier, greatly enhancing defense.

armorList.name: Dream Weave Cloak
armorList.description: A cloak woven from the dreams of the Dreamweaver, it allows the wearer to phase in and out of reality, evading attacks and becoming nearly invisible.

armorList.name: Phantom Cloak
armorList.description: A cloak that allows the wearer to phase in and out of the Ghost Code, evading attacks and becoming nearly invisible.

armorList.name: Ghost Code Armor
armorList.description: Armor Given to Arc Tech Soldiers to protect them from the Ghost Code Virus
